talk_50:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Angry_00>Ah.<sp:5:0:0> It seems you do not know of
<clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>They are necessities around here.<sp:5:0:0>
Allow me to explain.
talk_63:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>The rafts seem to be beyond repair. <sp:5:0:0>The
<clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff> cannot help us mend them.
talk_51:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This green thing is called a <clr:0000>Zonai device<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>The one you see here is a <clr:0000>fan<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0> You can
produce wind on demand by striking it.<sp:0:4:0>They are self-evidently useful. We have a
variety of <clr:0000>Zonai devices <clr:ffff>for multitudinous
purposes.
talk_64:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I am resting until the time bell rings.<sp:0:4:0>The <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff> by the water are still
in working order if you need one.
talk_52:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Using <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff> does<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>require energy.<sp:0:4:0>An external <clr:0000>Energy Cell <clr:ffff>will be necessary
in your case.
talk_65:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>When will we be able to cross again?<sp:0:4:0>The <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff> by the water are still
in working order if you need one.
talk_66:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You may have need of them. The <clr:0000>Zonai
devices <clr:ffff>by the water are available for
your use.
talk_54:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Yes. <sp:5:0:0>This green thing is a <clr:0000>Zonai device<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>The <clr:0000>fan <clr:ffff>here activates when struck and
can produce wind whenever you want.
talk_67:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Tired>We are out of options for now. <sp:5:0:0>It is time
for us to rest.
talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Aaah! <sp:5:0:0>We may have need of these parts.<sp:5:0:0>
There are more materials near the water
available for your use.
talk_69:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Ah. <sp:5:0:0>You have one already. <sp:5:0:0>That is a relief.<sp:0:4:0>But perhaps a refresher explanation is
in order.
talk_57:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:SurpriseS_00><sp:5:0:0>Oh? <sp:5:0:0>You seem to lack an <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>The lack of an <clr:0000>Energy Cell <clr:ffff>will prevent you
from using <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Yet <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff> are necessities in this
region. <sp:5:0:0>I have a solution. You should take
my spare.
talk_58:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:SurpriseS_00><sp:5:0:0>Oh? <sp:5:0:0>You seem to lack an <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>The lack of an <clr:0000>Energy Cell <clr:ffff>will prevent you
from using <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><clr:0000>Zonai device<clr:ffff> are necessities in this
region. <sp:5:0:0>I have a solution. You should
take my spare.
talk_59:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Sleep><sp:0:2:2:5000>It is very difficult to rest peacefully when things
like this happen.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk_70:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>An <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff> stores the energy required
to use <clr:0000><sp:5:0:0>Zonai devices<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Its energy will replenish automatically
while <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff> are not in use.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Its capacity is not unlimited. <sp:5:0:0>Use the
energy contained within wisely. <sp:5:0:0>Otherwise
you may run out at inopportune moments.
talk_49:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>The rafts for crossing to the other
side are broken. <sp:5:0:0>Transportation is
on hold indefinitely.<sp:0:4:0>This is ordinarily where we send
resources across the river.<sp:0:4:0>The only silver lining <sp:5:0:0>is that the <clr:0000>Zonai
devices<clr:ffff> are undamaged.
talk_71:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:ffff>An <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff> stores the energy required
to use <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Its energy will replenish automatically
while <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff> are not in use.<sp:0:4:0>Its capacity is not unlimited. <sp:5:0:0>Use the
energy contained within wisely. Otherwise
you may run out at inopportune moments.
talk_72:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>One note of caution. Your <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff> will
deplete while using a <clr:0000>Zonai device<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Rest assured that it will recharge on its
own in time.
talk_60:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad><sp:5:0:0>Pardon the long explanation. <sp:5:0:0>It does not
change our need for a raft.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff> are extremely useful. <sp:5:0:0>Think
creatively and you will find many ways to
employ them.
talk_61:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>We have the <clr:0000>Zonai device<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:1:0>But I do not
see how it will help us with the broken-
raft situation.
